summary: The core package supplies foundational utilities for building and running climate indicator workflows with xarray. It covers calendar conversions, time‑coordinate handling, data quality checks, metadata formatting, indicator definition and execution, language‑specific localization, configurable library options, unit management via Pint, and assorted helper functions used throughout the library.
business_intent: Enable climate scientists and modelers to compute standardized, CF‑compliant indicators reliably by providing reusable components for time handling, data validation, unit conversion, metadata management, and internationalization, thereby improving reproducibility and efficiency of climate data analysis pipelines.
